replies.user_meeting_schedule_ask_schedule: I would like to schedule a meeting.
replies.ask_name: Can I get your name, please?
replies.meeting_ask_guest_name: With whom would you like to schedule the meeting?
replies.meeting_ask_day: What day did you have in mind for the meeting?
replies.meeting_ask_start_time: For what time should the meeting be scheduled?
replies.meeting_ask_end_time: When do you expect the meeting to wrap up?
replies.meeting_ask_reason: Would you like to note down an optional reason for the meeting?
replies.user_meeting_schedule_inform_reason: The reason for the meeting is [MESSAGE]
replies.user_meeting_schedule_inform_no_reason: No, I don't want to provide a reason
replies.db_meeting_inform_confirmed: [RESULT] APIName = meeting_schedule ; Day = [DAY_OF_WEEK]; EndTime = [TIME] ; GuestName = [NAME] ; Message = Your meeting has been successfuly scheduled. ; StartTime = [TIME] ;
replies.meeting_inform_confirmed: Fantastic, your meeting with {guest_name:s} has been successfully scheduled for {day:s}, {start_time:s}-{end_time:s}.
replies.db_meeting_inform_unavailable: [RESULT] APIName = meeting_schedule ; Day = [DAY_OF_WEEK] ; EndTime = [TIME] ; GuestName = [NAME] ; Message = That person has a conflicting meeting at that time. Try another meeting time. ; StartTime = [TIME] ;
replies.meeting_inform_unavailable_ask_different:
Unfortunately {guest_name:s} is not able to make {day:s} @ {start_time:s}.
Would you like to try scheduling the meeting for a different day or time?
replies.user_meeting_schedule_inform_different_t: if he can meet with me on [DAY_OF_WEEK] at [TIME]
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.meeting_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there is no one of that name in our system. Could you dobule check the name of your guest, please?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you with scheduling meetings.
